hector7.name: Hector
hector7.title: Steel Warrior
hector7.description: Brother of Marquess Ostia and rumored to be a little rough around the edges. He dashes to aid his best friend Eliwood whenever he's in danger. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

Castle Hall: Eliwood hatched a plan to search for his father, but he didn't even come to me for help. Really, Eliwood?
My brother is no fool. We all hear what he tells people, but he knows what I'm up to, make no mistake.
You know, now that I think about it...I suspect Eliwood got himself mixed up in that succession dispute in Caelin.
Ostia is crawling with spies. Our neighbors want to know just how competent Uther will turn out to be.
Oh, we have spies too. I'd say the most competent in Ostia is Leila, no contest!
Visit: Eliwood and I are thick as thieves— like you and [F]!
Level: This is a battlefield. If you don't want to die, then you'd better run.
No time to talk—I have to mop up some ne'er-do-wells.
Summon: No need to be formal. Name's Hector, and I'll take care of what needs taking care of.
Confession:
Eliwood and I have been bound since we were kids. We even swore a warrior's oath.
We cut the palms of our hands and pressed them together, mingling our blood.
We vowed that if either of us was in danger, the other would stake his life. That day, we became men.
And now Eliwood's father, Lord Elbert, has gone missing. This is serious.
Problem is, I can't mobilize Ostia's army. My brother must be chafing at that too. He looks up to Elbert.
All this is to say that I'm going to help on my own—unofficially speaking.
I don't know who's responsible. Be it the Black Fang or not, I give you my word I'll crush them!
Status: Oh ho...
This outfit matches his. Do we need to dress exactly the same?
Whoa! Do you need something to keep you occupied?
Eliwood is not built as sturdy as I am. I hope he doesn't do anything reckless.
Is there no one willing to spar with me?
I will always rush to his aid, even when I am a feeble old man.
Eliwood. If you die before me, I will never forgive you!
I am close to Eliwood because we share the same worldview. My friendship with you is growing for the same reasons, Summoner.

leila3.name: Leila
leila3.title: Superb Shadow
leila3.description: A spy who serves House Ostia. She is exceptionally skilled and loyal, and has a romantic relationship with Matthew. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

Castle Hall: Valor, the Dread Isle, is off the southern coast of Lycia. I hear the Dragon's Gate is there...
I was following Lord Uther's orders to investigate Marquess Pherae's disappearance.
You should really rest. The only reason I can work nonstop is because I've trained for it.
This castle is not the most secure, but in the areas that really matter, it's managed well. Impressive.
I posed as a member of the Black Fang for the past several months.
Visit: I am Leila. Pleased to make your acquaintance. This is a gift from [F].
Level: Seems you were too late to challenge me. Get lost, won't you?
Just keep moving, Matthew...like you always do...
Summon: I'm Leila. My job is to gather intel, infiltrate the enemy, and sabotage them. All good uses of my skills.
Learn Skill: Thank you. I take it this is to prepare for our next job, right?
Confession:
The Black Fang were once regarded as chivalrous by the common folk.
As an organization of assassins, they targeted only nobles who preyed on the weak.
But their leader has changed since his second marriage. Now, their targets are based purely on price.
A mysterious man, Nergal, controls the Black Fang through their leader's new wife, Sonia.
My role is to determine Nergal's goals and prevent him from achieving them.
I have a bad feeling... Lord Uther does as well. We must stop the Black Fang, at any cost!
Status: So, what do you think? New weapon, new outfit...
Hey! That's it, you've done it. One day, you'll pay for this. *chuckle*
People want to know what you like. They keep asking me.
I would have served Lord Uther even at the cost of my life.
I can see Lord Hector is acting rashly, per usual...
If Matthew sees me— No, I shouldn't be daydreaming. I need to keep my head clear, my hopes low.
Go on, give me an order. Anything at all, I'll get it done. I'm more than sly words, you know.

rune.name: Rune
rune.title: Source of Wisdom
rune.description: A boy who fled from Ásgarðr, the celestial realm. Through his mysterious power he can decipher writings that depict the beginning of creation.

Castle Hall: Midgard...the world of mortals... This is a place I have only heard of in stories and legends.
The celestial realm of Ásgarðr is ruled by Alfaðör, the king of heaven.
There exist mysterious writings that tell of all creation. I wonder who wrote them...
It is said that there is one creator of all the nine worlds. For what purpose would they do this...
Ásgarðr and Vanaheimr are both realms of gods. One day, I would like to visit Vanaheimr, the realm of light.
Visit: Hello. I am Rune. I offer you greetings from [F].
Level: One day...I want to be able to fight like the gods and heroes from the stories I have heard.
Is it even possible for someone like me to fight like a hero?
I knew it... I am sorry...
Summon: I am Rune. The Celestial King is after me. That is why I fled Ásgarðr...
Learn Skill: Th-thank you! With this, do you think I can learn to fight?
Confession:
I have been weak since I was little... I never went outside much.
The only comfort I felt was from the legendary stories I read... Stories of heroic adventures.
There was one... The Twilit Runes. It told of a great battle between the gods and the heroes...
Reading it, I imagined myself as a hero in battle. I want to have an adventure like that one day...
When I am with you, I feel excited for our adventures together. Would you mind if I stay with you awhile longer?
Status: Oh...
I fled from the celestial realm of Ásgarðr... I am Rune.
*gasp* Oh, I am sorry. Did I make a mistake?
I know where I came from, but... I am no god.
Throughout the nine worlds, there are mysterious writings that tell of all creation.
I came to realize I am able to decipher some of the writing, but...only a small part.
Alfaðör is the king of heaven. He...is after me...
I am interested in learning more about you. Do you mind if I stay?

uther.name: Uther
uther.title: Frugal Militarist
uther.description: Marquess Ostia, the head of the Lycian League. Though his body appears strong, he suffers from an incurable disease. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

Castle Hall: Hector, the headstrong fool, has not been in contact in some time. He is a nitwit, hmph... But I worry about him.
I am sorry about Lord Elbert. I was powerless to help. I did wrong by Eliwood.
Wounds may heal, but it seems one's innards are not so simple. One must pay for the recklessness of youth.
What is Nergal after? Commanding the Black Fang across all of Elibe, stirring discord in every land...
An invasion would be madness. My brother must understand that. If there is a problem, he must act alone.
Visit: There is something to learn from any castle. I must thank your friend for the introduction.
Level:
None should allow themselves excess luxury. Doing so can lead to mental and physical depravity!
The heart of Ostia lies in working hard and paying respect to valor.
I will aid you as much as I can.
Urk... *cough* *cough* Worry not. It has settled. It was nothing.
Summon: I am Uther, Marquess Ostia, leader of Lycia. I cannot shame myself before my brother or his acquaintances.
Learn Skill: Your thoughtfulness is impressive. I feel compelled to do something in return.
Confession:
If asked to choose between me and his country, my brother would not hesitate in rushing to my side.
Though he speaks in anger, we are brothers. We are our only family. I would never doubt his affection.
Yet what if the choice were between brother and friend? To choose one would mean abandoning the other.
He would come to despise himself, whatever his choice. Ostia's treasure must not bear such a burden.
I ask that you please think of our meeting as an important twist of fate, [S].
And I want you to watch over my brother...watch over Hector.
This is the first and only request I have ever and will ever make, not as Marquess Ostia, but as a brother.
Status: Hmm...
I am Uther, Marquess Ostia. You may know Hector, my fool of a brother.
Oh, it is you. Haha... I thought it was that headstrong fool...
Ah, Hector...don't trouble Lord Eliwood by being overly obstinate.
For generations, our ancestors dedicated themselves to a sort of...frugal militarism.
I still regret what happened to Lord Elbert. I was powerless to help.
Oswin, Hector... This is in your hands now.
Do your best for all of us, and I will do all I can to help you.
